                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
It was no ordinary life for a young girl: living among scholars in the hallowed 
halls of Jordan College and tearing unsupervised through Oxford&#039;s motley streets 
on mad quests for adventure. But Lyra&#039;s greatest adventure would begin closer to 
home, the day she heard hushed talk of an extraordinary particle. Microscopic in 
size, the magical dust- found only in the vast Artic expanse of the North -was 
rumored to possess profound properties that could unite whole universes. But 
there were those who feared the particle and would stop at nothing to destroy 
it. Catapulted into the heart of a terrible struggle, Lyra was forced to seek 
aid from clans, gyptians, and formidable armored bears. And as she journeyed 
into unbelievable danger, she had not the faintest clue that she alone was 
destined to win, or to lose, this more-than-mortal battle...

Director: Chris Weitz

Writers : Chris Weitz
        : Philip Pullman
